name: Kapost
author: Kapost

sections.description:
This plugin enables posts to be published from Kapost.com to your WordPress blog.

The following capabilities are available:

  • Author bylines and bios
  • SEO integrations with popular plugins such as Yoast
  • Draft previews

For more information, visit the Kapost and Kapost Help websites.
sections.installation:
1. Upload all the files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

2.2.0

  • bumped wordpress compatibility to 5.2.3
  • added proper cache-busting to Kapost Preview URLs

2.1.9

  • bumped wordpress compatibility to 5.2.2
  • added compatibility with the “WP Offload Media Lite” plugin

2.1.8

  • bumped wordpress compatibility to 4.9.8
  • bumped php compatibility to 7.x

2.1.7

  • improved merged array custom field handling

2.1.6

  • bumped wordpress compatibility to 4.9.6
  • added support for unix timestamp custom fields
  • added support for newer WPML versions
  • added support for merged array custom fields
  • added support for making the first taxonomy term primary

2.1.5

  • bumped wordpress compatibility to 4.9.5
  • added support for page/post attributes

2.1.4

  • bumped wordpress compatibility to 4.9.2
  • added protected custom field whitelist

  • bumped wordpress compatibility to 4.8.0

  • added extra filter for image validation

2.0.2

  • added expert setting to control analytics

  • added extra filter for image look-ups
  • bumped wordpress compatibility to 4.6.1

  • improved support for featured images

1.9.9

  • improved custom post type handling
  • WordPress 4.5.2 compatibility

1.9.8

  • added auto-draft handling

1.9.7

  • WordPress 4.5.1 compatibility

1.9.6

  • added support for various filters which allow third parties to extend the plugin
  • added support for previewing attributions

1.9.5

  • Now supports sending stats over https

  • improved compatibility with the Amazon S3 and Cloudfront plugin

  • added support for the WCK Plugin

1.8.7

  • improved integration with the WPML Plugin

1.8.6

  • added support for the WPML Plugin

1.8.5

  • added support for the Subheading Plugin

1.8.4

  • fixed ability to update the user (for new users) profile photo (if user-photo is installed)

1.8.3

  • improved kapost.getPreview

1.8.2

  • improved kapost.getPermalink to play nice with the ‘No Category Parents’ plugin

1.8.1

  • added support for preview
  • improved kapost.getPermalink

1.8.0

  • added support for interacting with the JW Player plugin

1.7.9

  • added support for multiple custom fields with the same name

1.7.8

  • updated readme

1.7.7

  • added image custom field support

1.7.6

  • added better update metadata (control)

  • added ability to update certain user metadata

1.7.4

  • improved kapost.getPermalink

  • double escaping fixes

1.7.2

  • set author bio/desc on auto user create

  • added new analytics

  • added kapost.editPost

  • added image metadata support

1.2.0

  • added built-in Kapost Analytics support

1.0.2

1.0.1

short_description: This plugin enables posts to be published from Kapost.com to your WordPress blog.
description:
This plugin enables posts to be published from Kapost.com to your WordPress blog.

The following capabilities are available:

  • Author bylines and bios
  • SEO integrations with popular plugins such as Yoast
  • Draft previews

For more information, visit the Kapost and Kapost Help websites.
